name: Rabbit Hole (GianlucaBianchi, Nillayer)
description:
Rabbit Hole The moles have captured your four friends and now you have to save and bring them home. Beware the dark dungeons. Instructions: Save your four friends and return to home in order to win You can kill the moles by leading them into the spikes Controls:
  • Left Mouse - dig holes
  • Right Mouse - put dirt blocks
  • A & D - walk
  • Space - jump
  • M - map
Developers:
  • Nillayer: https://nillayer.itch.io/
  • GianlucaBianchi: https://gianlucabianchi.itch.io/
